text_block_list.text: One day, while I was at the gym, I heard strange murmuring…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Deadlifting… Dead… Why does it have such a scary name…?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Well it doesn't matter! Since Prez can do it, I can too! Welp, guess I'll start with 200kg!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Uwaaah! T-Trainer?! Don't surprise me like that! I was just about to do some deading.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yup! It's one of the things on my muscle building regimen! It's called "deadlifting".

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: You grab the barbell with both hands. Then you scream while you raise it above your waist.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But I heard that Prez could lift 200kg, so I figured I'd try it too!
It would be impossible for her to lift that much weight from the start. I recommended her a similarly effective training, but…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Nngh… But I wanna do the same weight as her! There has to be a reason why she chose that weight!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: If I don't do the same things as her, I won't be able to catch up to her. That's why I have to do it!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Anyways, here I go!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Y-Yay, I did it! Trainer, were you watching? I was able to lift the same weight as Prez did!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Right? I just need to keep up this pace and I'll be able to pass up Prez!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I can do this…! I can really do this! I think I can take on all of Prez's training regimens now!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Alrighty then, I'll move onto the next training!
Without heeding any of my warnings, Tokai Teio meticulously continued her strength training
The Next Day.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Traaiineer… Trai– Gah!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ugh… my whole body is sore… and all my muscles hurt…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But it's a sign that it's working, right?! The more it hurts, the more your muscles grow! Guess I should head to the racetrack…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Agahgahgah… It hurts too much! I don't think I can train like this!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Nngh… Maybe I did go a bit overboard. But I just followed Prez's training regimen…
choice_data_list: It's because you didn't pace yourself…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, maybe you're right.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I might have gotten a little too carried away. I should have talked to you about it, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I'm really sorry about this, so is there anything you can do about this pain?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I don't want to be out of commission for a whole day, so please do something! Please!?
After listening to her pleas, I decided to have her stretch and warm her muscles a bit. Then…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Woah, what the heck?! That was so easy! Trainer, are you some kinda genius? Why was that so effective?
choice_data_list: It was thanks to your own flexibility.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Mine? Really? My muscles may not be as strong and stiff as Prez's, but maybe that means they also heal faster. Ehehe♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Alrighty then, now I can get back to training! Agaaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Aww, really? I guess even for me, going straight back to training is impossible. Dangit…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Okay fine, I guess I'll take today off… I'm sorry for all of this, Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But just you wait, I'm not going to stay so weak! I'm going to get stronger!
